report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-0005 Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) Platform Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-0005 Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) Platform Vulnerability
text: Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) Platform could allow a local authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an unspecified flaw. By physically probing the JTAG interface, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.
